name: nodejs-tutorial
description: 1. After cloning / downloading these files you'll need to rename the `env.txt` file to instead be named `.env` 2. In your `.env` file you'll need to enter your MongoDB connection string value, as well as your Cloudinary Cloud Name, Cloudinary API Key, and Cloudinary API Secret values. 3. In your command-line run the `npm install` command to pull in the dependencies. 4. You can start the project locally by running the `npm run dev` command. 5. You can then visit the project in your web browser by visiting `localhost:3000` or whatever port number you might have chosen in your `.env` file.
